alert.note: Alert for Dorchester; Inland Colleton (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 2:13PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF COLLETON AND DORCHESTER COUNTIES... At 213 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Canadys, or 9 miles north of Walterboro, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...excessive cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...All outdoor activities should cease. Move indoors immediately. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Canadys. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<45 MPH
info.instruction: Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 15 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
